website_summaries.verdict: The best budget children's costume that is bright and easy to see.
pros: Intricate peacock tail is highly visible from great distances while outside
High quality fabric will resist tearing around the large tail section
cons: Costume requires hand washing and air drying only
May be damaged in the washing machine

customer_reviews.title: Pretty as a Peacock!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute costume! My little girl loved it and she looked awesome for her Mardi Gras Parade! The fit was right on as well. She wears a girl's 6 in clothing and I purchased the small costume! I'm very satisfied!!
customer_reviews.author: Allison R Singleton

customer_reviews.title: Cheap & cute.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 5 years old, tall for her age & weighed about 50 pounds when she first wore this. I bought a small & it was perfect with even a little room to spare. Now, it’s 5 months later & it still fits when she wears this for dress up. It’s true the top little hair piece is not the best but it’s easy to customize, figure out how to keep it up & add some pizzazz to it. My daughter loved it & everyone commented on how beautiful she looked. Not really too peacock looking but still pretty darn adorable.
customer_reviews.author: The Mrs

customer_reviews.title: The headpiece is not made of the best quality either
customer_reviews.text: This costume is very brightly colored. The material is ok. For the price, I don't know what people expect. The collar material is very stiff and scratchy, to the point where I see my child taking it off before too long. However, I see why it has to be stiff for it to stand up though. The headpiece is not made of the best quality either, but I can make it work somehow. The costume looks pretty much like the picture and the colors are the same too. I can see my daughter enjoying this a lot.
customer_reviews.author: L. Ma

customer_reviews.title: Cute outfit
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter was proud as a peacock in this outfit and was the only person we saw wearing one of them. It’s also well made as she had worn it as a play outfit since Halloween and it’s still holding up well. The only complaint I have is the headpiece was small and stiff and the comb to attach it to your hair kept falling out. We ended up buying some peacock feathers at hobby lobby and constructing our own headpiece.
customer_reviews.author: Shelia J. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Horrible headpiece, awesome costume
customer_reviews.text: This is a super cute costume that my second grader picked out for Halloween. The only reason I am taking away a star is that the picture is not very accurate. The headpiece is much smaller and extremely difficult to use. My daughter does dance so I'm not stranger to weird headpieces but this one has me puzzled on how to get it to stand up and stay up. Also, the neck of the dress doesn't really look like the picture. But overall, it's cute and fit true to size.
customer_reviews.author: RoyalSmash

customer_reviews.title: You get what you paid for
customer_reviews.text: Size small fits my 3t wearing toddler. The netting around the collar is made of painful wiry fish netting. The headpiece looks horrible and definitely not as pictured with some missing broken feathers see my pics. It fell apart before even wearing it and I had to buy a separate headpiece to complete the look. My daughter loves to spread the tail but it's attached with cheap plastic which I'm sure will break by the end of the Halloween party. Very disappointed based on reviews didn't expect this.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Runs small, headpiece is weird
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 6 years old, weighs 40lbs and is 42 1/2 inches tall. She usually wears a 5T or XS pants and S top. Based on her sizes and measurements I ordered a small. It barely fits. The feather hairpiece is weird. The way the comb is set, the feathers lay flat on her head instead of straight up. Quality of material is okay. It will work for the one night we need the outfit and will make a fun addition to the dress up box.
customer_reviews.author: JLynn Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Great other than the headpiece
customer_reviews.text: I read other reviews that complained about the headpiece but took it with a grain of salt. Ok but the headpiece is truly horrific. I attached a picture. Like I don’t even know what it’s supposed to be. Otherwise, the costume is great. I ordered a small for my 40lb 6yo who is very very thin and it fits just fine. She loves it, and I’ll probably just get a different headpiece or a mask for her to wear.
customer_reviews.author: KellyB9716

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old daughter loved this Halloween costume! The material is thin, so I had to make some repairs to it after a couple of wears. She got tons of complements on it though. The feather headpiece fell apart as well. I hot glued it back together temporarily. For the price, it did the trick.
customer_reviews.author: JessicaT

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This is practically made out of tissue paper the fabric is so thin. My daughter wore this to a Halloween event at the zoo this weekend and before we even made it all the way into the zoo the costume was falling apart. She was walking and the sleeve just randomly broke off. Throughout the night the costume continued to fall the pieces. We are now left with a torn up costume for her to wear trick or treating on Halloween. Very disappointed in the quality of this costume.
customer_reviews.author: George K Smith

customer_reviews.title: Peacock Girl
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a small for my 4 year old. She is 30 pounds and 43” tall. It fits perfectly. I tied the plastic strings tighter around her wrist so they “feathers” stayed and didn’t slide. The hair piece was a little cheap, maybe for an even better look, but your own feathers to stick in her hair. But she loved it and got so many compliments!
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: great for my 7 yr old
customer_reviews.text: Costume was fairly decent, considering it's a Halloween costume. The small size fit my slender average height 7 yr old great with a little room to grow. So glad I didn't order the medium, it would have been way too big. The headpiece like others commented isn't that great and won't stay on her head so I'm planning on glueing it on to a different hair pin.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Chung

customer_reviews.title: Headpiece NOT as pictured, otherwise cute costume
customer_reviews.text: Costume is decent quality for a Halloween costume, however the headpiece is NOT as pictured. It comes with a measly little feather instead of what is shown on the model. I know accessories are usually sold separately but when you say headpiece and show an example of it that is what I expect to receive. We will try to make it work since it’s not worth the hassle of returning and trying to see if a different headpiece arrives. My daughter does look super cute in it!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren22

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: One of the shoulder straps was broken straight out of the package and one of he wrist straps that hold up the tail broke the first time my daughter wore it, but overall it’s a very cute costume, as long as you're able to perform minor repairs! The headpiece is a bit flimsy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Monica H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect costume, great quality & beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly cute costume! Small fits my daughter pretty good, a little big but will work. She is 5, around 30 lbs. Great quality, fabric is comfortable, and beautiful. It looks like the picture. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: H. N. Lombard

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful costume. Happy seven year old!
customer_reviews.text: Well made, beautiful, and still in perfect condition after several days of wear. My seven year old loved this costume. She is definitely on the small size (42lbs, ) but a small fit her well. Worth double the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: tiffany d.

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: This was a very cute costume. I added a little TLC like steaming out the wrinkles and restitching a few spots that seemed loose. Overall though it was a great costume for the money.
customer_reviews.author: JillianKK

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and unique
customer_reviews.text: Pretty costume for a child and a great value. Hairpiece does not stand up like the photo but can use additional clips to fix it onto hair. If your child has thicker hair than it will be easier. The costume itself has pretty color, just have to keep in mind it is not regular clothing so material is not as sturdy and have to be gentle with it.
customer_reviews.author: purple shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very cute costume! EXACTLY as described...unfortunately I needed to return due to sizing issue and timing of a school play. The small 4-6 is more or less a true 4 and it was too small for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Cute costume
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, ran a little small. My daughter wore this for Halloween, it was cute but for our winter weather we had she couldn’t wear it. She wears it around the house and as a dress up item. The wings are durable and haven’t ripped as she’s played with them.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Marie Adamson

customer_reviews.title: The strap came off in few minutes
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful dress, beats headpiece, everything about the dress was beautiful except that the strap on the shoulder came off in couple of minutes. Also there was no tag on the dress. The packing gave a feel that it wasn’t a new dress. Had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This costume is beautiful and my daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: This costume is beautiful and my daughter loves it. The reason why I'm giving it four stars instead of five is because the headpiece is terrible. First it isn't as big as shown in the pic. It comes on this cheap bendable clip that is impossible to clip on your hair. It falls out and lays flat on your head. I ended up taking it off the clip and used hot glue to glue on a headband.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca182

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves, loves, loves this costume! I read some of the other reviews regarding the head piece, and I have to agree that it seems to be missing some feathers, but I think I’ll just add some additional feathers myself. My daughter is a 6/7 and the small fits perfectly. I was debating on going up a size, but I’m glad I didn’t get the medium it would have been too big. Best costume for under $20!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this was amazing. The wrist handles that hold up the wings broke pretty quickly, but I was able to make it work with some fishing line.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Daane

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute
customer_reviews.text: This costume was just as cute in person as it was in the picture! My daughter got so many compliments and I could tell she really loved it. I totally recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, but not super sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Last mostly through halloween but definitely came apart by the end
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great outfit not so great headpiece
customer_reviews.text: Loved the dress but the head piece does not look anything like the picture advertised. Other than the headpiece my 5 year old loved the outfit.
customer_reviews.author: Courtenay Euton

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: I’m not happy with the head piece. The feathers are all just piles and glued together. Looks messy.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly M.

customer_reviews.title: CUTE CUTE CUTE!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old got the small, it's a little large but it'll fit her for a long time... lots of dress up time! I tied the back up and it fit well. She looked so precious in this, and got lots of compliments. She will be wearing this again for Mardi Gras, since it's PERFECCCCTTTT for it!! :)
customer_reviews.author: IgoBrokeOnAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Most beautiful peacock costume I have ever seen
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this outfit for my 6 year old now 7 whom had to dress in her favorite animal for school, she chose a peacock, I went on amazon and found this costume, couple days later it arrived, I was blown away by the beauty of this costume, the color are so vibrant, the picture doesn’t do it justice.
customer_reviews.author: Christiane Sakho

customer_reviews.title: Looks great on my petite 7 year old and fits great
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on my petite 7 year old and fits great. She loves it too. We bought a size small.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hartley

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This Costume is fantastic! My daughter loves it and fits as expected. Sure the headpiece could be a little sturdier but it was $16!! Great deal, great costume.
customer_reviews.author: TheSquidsFist

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute for Halloween! She loved it and looked adorable! Only complaint was the head piece looked nothing like the picture and I had to hurry and make something that would work.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Barker

customer_reviews.title: Head piece is not the same as in the picture
customer_reviews.text: The head piece that came with this costume does not look anything like what is in the picture. It's cheap looking and all it is, is a piece of cloth glued to a clip with 4 feathers that are glued and smashed to the cloth. Not very happy with this at all. I will have to make the head piece myself. Don't buy this costume unless you buy or make a different head piece.
customer_reviews.author: clint

customer_reviews.title: Cute but had a pull
customer_reviews.text: This is cute and fit my 4 year-old well. Unfortunately, hers came with a pull down the center but not worth exchanging at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and reasonably priced!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and very cute and colorful costume. She was a one of a kind in her neighborhood on Halloween night!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara W

customer_reviews.title: I ordered the size recommended for my 4 year old
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the size recommended for my 4 year old. I ordered it by the weight ranges. Runs a bit small. The skirt part kept riding up at the waist for her. The neck ruffle didn't line up right. One side rested lower than other side so it looked crocked. 4 year old love it though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Costume, Cost!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute! Daughter loved it! It’s a little uncomfortable but what Halloween costume isn’t! It seems durable enough for one night. Great value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Mwiley

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong for your little peacock!
customer_reviews.text: This costume was a great price, decent quality and a hit. Tired of seeing all the same costumes. Was happy when my daughter said she wanted to be a peacock and this was a steal for how cute it was. highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: CHOEK

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Super cute costume, my 6 year old loves it. Really well made and put together.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Coombs

customer_reviews.title: Great size and cute outfit for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great size and cute outfit for the price. The headpiece is just feathers on one of those comb things that were popular in the 90s. We bought our own face mask from Factory Card Outlet to use instead of the headband included. The "tail" does have plastic things to put on the kid's wrists. I was happy to see that!
customer_reviews.author: Abbey T.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!! I kind of guess on the size ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect!! I kind of guess on the size judging from the picture I thought it was for a older kids, but it worked and fitted perfectly. Seller should have size chart. Dress, was beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Jensen John

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Nice - Skimped on the hair comb feathers
customer_reviews.text: We were pretty happy with the product. It was pretty and my daughter enjoyed wearing it for Halloween. The biggest quality issue was that the hair comb had very few feathers and did not look much like the one in the picture - it was only about half the width. Otherwise, it was just fine for a Halloween costume.
customer_reviews.author: AmHadwk

customer_reviews.title: It was cute but the headpiece didnt look like the picture and the part that goes around the ...
customer_reviews.text: It was cute but the headpiece didnt look like the picture and the part that goes around the neck was not as full as the picture
customer_reviews.author: Savitree Singh

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the small for my 4 y/o. She wears 4t or XS. It fits very well, except for the shoulder straps are a little big. My daughter loves is and is very excited. The quality is good for a costume, and it is comfortable to wear. The skirt twirls - it's almost a full circle skirt (very important to my daughter!) We're excited for Halloween!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Loved It!!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it and we got so many compliments. She looked so cute on Halloween.
customer_reviews.author: nccu122006

customer_reviews.title: The costume in the package is absolutely nothing like the picture
customer_reviews.text: The costume in the package is absolutely nothing like the picture. It stated it came with dress with tail and headpiece. As you can see in the picture it is only a dress that is probably a different costume altogether. I will be promptly returning this, my daughter was very dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: john lokey

customer_reviews.title: Just what she wanted
customer_reviews.text: We love it!!!!! Pretty colors. Fast delivery. It is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Candice Martin

customer_reviews.title: SO beautifully made! My daughter was in love with everything ...
customer_reviews.text: SO beautifully made! My daughter was in love with everything about this costume! The comb on the head feather piece is a bit tricky but we made it work. The outfit is nice and tight which is perfect because my daughter is very thin. All in all great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amira

customer_reviews.title: ... this for my grand daughter for Halloween and she loved it. It fit her perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my grand daughter for Halloween and she loved it. It fit her perfectly. This was a surprise from me but her mother was even more surprised and delighted because she raises peacocks. So happy I got to surprise them both.
customer_reviews.author: cj

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved it. Fit was spot on
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it. Fit was spot on. Headpiece was lame and took a lot of creativity to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: Mjrleeg

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Nice costume. Well put together. My daughter is very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: ACatWay

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this dress and it's very pretty but the hair piece doesn't stay up at all
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this dress and it's very pretty but the hair piece doesn't stay up at all. I had to glue it onto a plastic tiara
customer_reviews.author: Guppy

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like pictured
customer_reviews.text: Looks nothing as pictured. Had to constantly explain what my daughter was. 😢
customer_reviews.author: Corey Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the most part
customer_reviews.text: Although a little smaller than expected we still managed to get it to fit her! The back piece that goes around the neck is not as fluffy as shown in the picture and the headpiece is an absolute joke! Looks nothing like the picture and will not even stand up!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Noble

customer_reviews.title: Cute and well made costume
customer_reviews.text: Looked great, and my 7 year old loved it. Only issue we had was how the head piece fit. We couldn't make it work. Otherwise outfit was very cute!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Watson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cheap material for the price and the tail feather ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cheap material for the price and the tail feather only stays out when hands are out. I wouldn't recommend this I've.
customer_reviews.author: Nursing101

customer_reviews.title: Missing headpiece 😔
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed..I really dont want to send this back just to get the headpeice... the costume is cute but upset the headpiece was missing!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Ulrich

customer_reviews.title: Super cute got lots of compliments on her costume
customer_reviews.text: Super cute got lots of compliments on her costume. However she complained it was very very itchy. Will be great if she could wear long sleeve under. It fits to size.
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: My back feathers came broken and she cannot wear them 😣
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: The hairpiece is very difficult to maneuver, the way it's constructed almost impossible to get it to stand upward
customer_reviews.author: Amber B

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Good deal for the price. Quality could have been a little better
customer_reviews.author: Donald B Young

customer_reviews.title: ... girl - her and all her friends had a great time putting on a fashion show for all the ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a birthday present for a 5 year old girl - her and all her friends had a great time putting on a fashion show for all the adults, great product!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn M. Hugill

customer_reviews.title: Order expedited and peacock costume was well worth the price I paid.  5 stars for seller and product!
customer_reviews.text: This peacock costume fits my granddaughters perfectly! It was delivered on time, packaged well and I am very satisfied with the seller and the costumes.
customer_reviews.author: Blessed Nana

customer_reviews.title: Cute costume
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of this for my girls. Good fit. My girls love it!
customer_reviews.author: Vincent L.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable. Feather hair accessory could of been vetter quality but it got the job done. My daughter won her costume contest w this one
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cute costume but headpiece not what I expected. Wouldn't stay up in 5 yr old head
customer_reviews.author: Kylee Claypool

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Costume was okay for the price. The size ran big. The hair piece was wouldn't stay put.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: NICE
customer_reviews.text: MY daughter looked adorable in this costume and upheld nicely...
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: The costume is very cute but definitely not like it is advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Kandie Murzin

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: looks just like the picture. my daughter loved it. made nicer than most cheap halloween costumes
customer_reviews.author: Krissy

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: Tore before child wore it. She had her heart set on it so I pinned it for Halloween. Would not buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a very very pretty costume. BUT the shoulder strap has already come ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a very very pretty costume. BUT the shoulder strap has already come off after only trying it on. ALSO runs small.
customer_reviews.author: Starchild

customer_reviews.title: It was very well made
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter complained that it was too itchy, she has fair skin
customer_reviews.author: Melba

customer_reviews.title: but I feel all costumes are like that. I worked for us
customer_reviews.text: This worked for my daughter. She wore it for Halloween. It is thin, but I feel all costumes are like that. I worked for us. Thought the sizing was right on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cute.
customer_reviews.text: Runs snug. If you're hoping to get wear for more than one season, I'd grab a size up.
customer_reviews.author: K St. Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The perfect perfect perfect Halloween costume for my 4-yr old. Quality is FANTASTIC.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The costume of peacock is very wonderful! My 5 years old dother loved it at ...
customer_reviews.text: The costume of peacock is very wonderful! My 5 years old dother loved it at first look. The most small size is like about 116-120. Tail is very comfortable and cute looking. But diadem was already broken when I took it from the bag. It is only not pleasant moment.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: We loved her custom. My daughter is 8 years old. She is slim and S size was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Darla
customer_reviews.text: It looks so cute on.. fits perfect .. however the headband is not made well.. it came apart. I had to make another one.. the costume overall is nice.. my granddaughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Darla Culver

customer_reviews.title: The peacock tail attachment faces the front so the back of it did not look pretty. I bought some tulle and added more material .
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a small for my 6 yr old. It fit perfectly but had several issues. The head piece looked awful and would not stay in her hair. The peacock tail attachment faces the front so the back of it did not look pretty. I bought some tulle and added more material to cover the back. The dress was not sewn correctly. The skirt was bunched up at some parts and completely straight at some parts causing the skirt to be lopsided...high on the right and low on the left. I did not like the shoulder piece and wished it was detachable so I could have had the option to remove it.
customer_reviews.author: hmomg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My little girl looked stunning in this peacock costume, except for the head piece which didn't fix properly.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: so I bought one size up and fits perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my 6 year old. Runs small, so I bought one size up and fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Carcache

customer_reviews.title: my daughter wanted to be a peacock for Halloween so ...
customer_reviews.text: my daughter wanted to be a peacock for Halloween so I made it happen. she can't wait to wear it it fits her good
customer_reviews.author: dgizzle

customer_reviews.title: All of Rubie's costumes are super high quality and have so much detail
customer_reviews.text: All of Rubie's costumes are super high quality and have so much detail!!! I get my little one every year for Halloween and it's always unique and perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The wrist bands that hold the feathers out broke off easily though.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really loves this costume. The wrist bands that hold the feathers out broke off easily though.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect on our 4 yr old
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect on our 4 yr old. Just wish the neckline had a way to stay up. Looked adorable regardless. She got a ton of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great costume!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality colors and style for a reasonable price! My 4 year old daughter wore this for several parties, halloween, and dress-up over the past year, and it has held up well!
customer_reviews.author: Crawmom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Peacock!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable! My 7 year old granddaughter loves this costume. Perfect for playing dress up or for Halloween.
customer_reviews.author: NanaJanet

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color and costume for my child. Lower stars because peacock tail was missing from package.
customer_reviews.author: A. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice fabric didn't look cheap...but the top did rip when just trying it on...just pinned it ;)
customer_reviews.author: A.M.L

customer_reviews.title: it looks just like the picture
customer_reviews.text: it fit perfectly! i got it for my 6yo for halloween and she loves it! it looks just like the picture. it was pretty wrinkly out of the package, but i expected that. the materials will relax after it's tried on and out of the package (hung up) for a while. i like that the "tail feathers" attach with velcro, so they can be removed if you want. but she'll be able to easily wear a jacket while out trick-or-treating w/out it getting in the way. it also came with a peacock feather hair clip/comb (not a headband like it looks in the picture..still cute though).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Short n not accurate
customer_reviews.text: Size not accurate as mentioned. To tight for my 5 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Genuine-review

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice costume, just as nice as the picture. Fits as expected
customer_reviews.author: Shana Dreyer

customer_reviews.title: It's wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This outfit was perfect and my lil girl loves it
customer_reviews.author: Antonette

customer_reviews.title: super cute
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Fit my 5 year old perfectly and everyone couldn't stop commenting how cute her outfit was on halloween.
customer_reviews.author: S. Jain

customer_reviews.title: Daughter (5) loved it, but its pretty cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: It looks cuter in the stock photo. Daughter (5) loved it, but its pretty cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Zorrilla

customer_reviews.title: ... this costume for me niece for Halloween and she loved it! She got many compliments on how pretty ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this costume for me niece for Halloween and she loved it! She got many compliments on how pretty she was.
customer_reviews.author: Delicia Ross

customer_reviews.title: Cute costume & good value
customer_reviews.text: Great costume! The dress with the wings is precious! Headpiece is ok, we were able to work with it. Wore it twice at Halloween carnivals without any issues so we think it's a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice costume. Head piece was a little flimsy but ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice costume. Head piece was a little flimsy but nothing a $0.50 barrette and some super glue can't fix. Everyone loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Peacock Costume, Small One Color
product_meta.description:
Size:Small| Color:As Shown| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingRubie's Costume Company has designed quality costume and fun clothing for decades. Trusted to be the leader of cosplay, halloween, and general decor items, Rubie's does not sacrifice quality for price. Expect the highest in costume design and material with Rubie's.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Rubie's Costume Company has been bringing costumes and accessories to the world since 1950. As the world's leader we take seriously the mission to make dressing up fun. Mascots, rental quality costumes, masks, wigs, accessories, shoes and every significant licensed costume you want to wear can be found under the Rubie's brand. Still family owned, still family focused, Rubie's brings you fun for every season, Halloween, Christmas, Mardi Gras, Easter and all in-between.
feature_bullets: Child's Peacock colored dress with attached collar and tail with wrist loops
Important: Costumes are sized differently than apparel, use the Rubie's child size Chart image, do not choose based on child's age or clothing size
Look for all of Rubie's animal costumes and accessories in sizes and styles for the entire family - from babies to adults and even pets
Family-owned, family-focused, and based in the U.S.A. Since 1951, Rubie's has classic and licensed costumes and accessories in sizes and styles for your entire family

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
